SELECT BBD.AmountType AS AmountType, BBD.Category1Idx AS Category1Idx, C.CategoryName AS CategoryName, SUM(BBD.Amount) AS TotalAmount
FROM BankBookDetail AS BBD
INNER JOIN BankBook AS BB ON BB.BankBookIdx = BBD.BankBookIdx LEFT JOIN Category AS C ON C.CategoryIdx = BBD.Category1Idx
WHERE BBD.HomeIdx = #{homeIdx} AND BB.BankBookTypeIdx = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(BBD.AmountDate, '%Y%m') = #{amountDateStr}
GROUP BY BBD.Category1Idx
ORDER BY TotalAmount DESC
